overview: Gianna's roommate, Gia, had been bisexual for ages, but Gianna had always thought of herself as straight. Is it the dry spell talking...or is this attraction she's feeling to Gia the real deal? When Isiah's girlfriend cancels their couple's yoga session at the last minute, their teacher, Karla, decides she'll teach him anyway. Eliza was committed to locking in a daytime booty call that Saturday afternoon, but truth be told, she was struggling. Something she wasn't at all used to. When she gets an unexpected text from Seth, Eliza invites him over to "help her build some furniture," and slams her laptop shut. Why does getting what you want feel so god damn good? With Jay's job keeping him away traveling for weeks at a time, Jillian can't help but feel those first date butterflies upon his return. That feeling of excitement and longing...the pure anticipation. She hated when he left, but god damn did she love when he came back.
title: Hot & Bothered
